name: Stage Group (c)
title: TNM 7 Stage Group
notes:
**Note 1:** SEER*RSA added additional information to UICC 7th edition stages with UICC approval. If your registry submits the directly assigned Stage Groups to agencies other than SEER, please check the AJCC 7th edition manual to ensure you are using the appropriate logic. 
* Stage Group III (as defined in the table)

**Note 2:** The stage group below is not defined in UICC 7th edition, defined in AJCC 7th edition, approved by UICC.
* Stage 0 - pTis, N0, M0, Grade X, Any Histology

**Note 3:** While the stage groups below are valid, the specified TNM combinations are only included in SEER*RSA.
* Stage Group 0 - Tis, NX, M0, Grade 2-4, Adenocarcinoma - NX is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IIB - T0, N1, M0, Any Grade, Adenocarcinoma - T0 is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IIIA - T0, N2, M0, Any Grade, Adenocarcinoma - T0 is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IIIA - T4 [NOS], N0, M0, Any Grade, Any Histology - T4 [NOS] is not included in the stage group definition
* Stage Group IIIC - T4 [NOS], (N1, N2), M0, Any Grade, Any Histology - T4 [NOS] is not included in the stage group definition

**Note 4:** Stage groups are based on histology, which is divided as follows                     
* Squamous 8000-8046,8051-8131,8148-8157,8230-8249,8508,8510-8513,8560-8570,8575,8950,8980-8981           
* Adenocarcinoma 8050,8140-8147,8160-8162,8170-8175,8180-8221,8250-8507,8514-8551,8571-8574,8576,8940-8941
